params.name: aws_access_key
params.label: AWS access key
params.description: If empty, uses AWS credentials from the environment (IAM role, ~/.aws/credentials or AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID environment variable)

params.name: aws_secret_key
params.label: AWS secret key
params.description: If empty, uses AWS credentials from the environment (IAM role, ~/.aws/credentials or AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY environment variable)

params.name: aws_region
params.label: AWS region
params.description: If empty, uses AWS region from the environment (~/.aws/config or AWS_DEFAULT_REGION environment variable)

params.name: api_quota_rate_limit
params.label: Rate limit
params.description: Maximum number of requests per period for a given DSS activity

params.name: api_quota_period
params.label: Period
params.description: Reset period of the quota in seconds

params.name: parallel_workers
params.label: Concurrency
params.description: Maximum number of threads calling the API in parallel
